title: Product feedback app
description: Product FeedBack App is a Guru challenge on FrontEnd Mentor that I built with React and Typescript. Among other Features of this application, users are able create, read, update, and delete product feedback request. Users can also filter suggestions by different categories, add comments and replies to a product feedback request.

title: Hotel Booking App
description: D-Apartments is a user-friendly Hotel Booking website made with Next JS(A React Framework). Users are able to choose different rooms with different prices in real-time, there is a simple form validation to get the guest details and an order summary.

title: Audiophile Ecommerce App
description: Audiophile E-commerce App is a web application that I built with Angular 8+, it is a Guru challenge on FrontEnd mentor. Users are able to add, remove and edit products from the cart.

title: REST Countries API
description: Rest Countries API is a FrontEnd Mentors ‘ADVANCED’ challenge that I made with React. Using javascript’s in-built fetch method, I was able to communicate with the API and display the countries in a fashion that gives a good user Experience. Users are able to see all countries from the API on the homepage, search for a country using an input field, Filter countries by region, click on a country to see more detailed information on a separate page and click through to the border countries on the detail page.

title: Invoice app
description: Invoice App is a web application I built with Vue and Vanilla CSS. Users are able to create, read, update, and delete invoices. Users will receive form validations when trying to create/edit an invoice.
